input: Innovations in agritech are helping farmers in the Casamance region optimize crop yields despite climate challenges.
Artificial intelligence is transforming the world.
Senegal's digital 2025 strategy aims to position the country as a leading technology hub in West Africa.
The introduction of coding into the national curriculum is empowering students in Dakar with essential 21st-century skills.
Local startups are leveraging fintech solutions to improve financial inclusion for small business owners in the Sahel region.
Recent ECOWAS summits have prioritized discussions on democratic stability and cross-border trade agreements.
Renewable energy projects, particularly solar farms, are critical for sustainable development across the continent.
Natural language processing enables computers to understand human language.
The expansion of 4G coverage has significantly boosted mobile money adoption in rural Senegalese communities.
Higher education reforms are currently being implemented to align university degrees with the demands of the local labor market.
The new Bus Rapid Transit system in Dakar is designed to reduce traffic congestion and lower urban carbon emissions.
Promoting gender equality in STEM fields remains a top priority for educational policymakers in the region.
Deep learning is a subset of machine learning based on neural networks.
